ValueDomain.changeDescription: 1/31/22 jk Released per EDRN qtrly review/Brenda D --- 2017-01-03 RR: This VD is used by CDE 5543121 which is not negatively impacted by the changes; Added "Classification" and "Level" as rep term qualifiers; changed the Rep term primary from "Type" To "Code"; Change the long name from "PROC_RESULT_CTCALCIFIED_CODE" to "Calcification Level Code"; Changed the conceptual domain from UML Default to "Disease, Disorder, or Finding."; Changed the definition from "Records the degree of calcification observed during an imaging procedure." to "Records the degree of calcification observed."; Added PVs; Added max length
